archimate:Assessment.name: Aki wants ESA to act as fire inspectors
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Rationale: When we talk about infrastructure, laptop config, or hardening, ESA should not be advisories. Aki doesn't want us to micro manage the organization.
Aki's directive is for the ESA team to operate in a capacity similar to that of fire inspectors, not only crafting the safety codes but also rigorously inspecting and ensuring adherence to these standards. This driver underscores the transition towards a proactive audit and compliance model within security.
